organizations.name: CultureLink
organizations.description: Support for newcomers, refugees, LGBTQ+ immigrants, and youth. Offers mentorship, language and employment programs. Address: 2340 Dundas St W, Toronto, ON M6P 4A9. Phone: (416) 588-6288. Email: info@culturelink.ca

organizations.name: The Neighbourhood Organization (TNO)
organizations.description: Settlement services, youth and seniors programming, employment readiness, and language classes. Address: 18 Thorncliffe Park Dr, Toronto, ON M4H 1N7. Phone: (416) 421-3054. Email: info@tno-toronto.org

organizations.name: ACCES Employment
organizations.description: Job search support, sector-specific bridging programs, and hiring connections for newcomers and job seekers. Address: 489 College St, Suite 100, Toronto, ON M6G 1A5. Phone: (416) 921-1800. Email: info@accesemployment.ca

organizations.name: Toronto Arts Council
organizations.description: Support for local artists and arts organizations through grants, resources, and advocacy. Address: 100 Queen St W, Toronto, ON M5H 2N2. Phone: (416) 392-6802. Email: info@torontoartscouncil.org

organizations.name: Harbourfront Centre
organizations.description: Cultural organization presenting contemporary arts, theatre, music, dance, and literature. Address: 235 Queens Quay W, Toronto, ON M5J 2G8. Phone: (416) 973-4000. Email: info@harbourfrontcentre.com

organizations.name: The 519
organizations.description: Community centre serving LGBTQ+ community with health, social, and cultural programs. Address: 519 Church St, Toronto, ON M4Y 2C9. Phone: (416) 392-6874. Email: info@the519.org

organizations.name: Boys and Girls Clubs of Toronto
organizations.description: Youth programming including after-school programs, summer camps, and leadership development. Address: 33 Beverley St, Toronto, ON M5T 1Y1. Phone: (416) 924-4822. Email: info@bgcto.ca

organizations.name: Daily Bread Food Bank
organizations.description: Food bank providing emergency food assistance to individuals and families in need. Address: 191 New Toronto St, Toronto, ON M8V 2E7. Phone: (416) 203-0050. Email: info@dailybread.ca

organizations.name: FoodShare Toronto
organizations.description: Community food programs including good food markets, school nutrition, and urban agriculture. Address: 90 Croatia St, Toronto, ON M6H 1L5. Phone: (416) 363-6441. Email: info@foodshare.net

organizations.name: Toronto Environmental Alliance
organizations.description: Environmental advocacy organization working on climate change, waste reduction, and sustainable transportation. Address: 30 Duncan St, Suite 403, Toronto, ON M5V 2C3. Phone: (416) 596-0660. Email: info@torontoenvironment.org

organizations.name: Evergreen
organizations.description: Environmental organization focused on bringing nature to cities through community engagement and education. Address: 550 Bayview Ave, Toronto, ON M4W 3X8. Phone: (416) 596-1495. Email: info@evergreen.ca

organizations.name: African Canadian Association of Ottawa
organizations.description: Community organization serving African and Caribbean communities with settlement, employment, and cultural programs. Address: 1419 Carling Ave, Ottawa, ON K1Z 7L6. Phone: (613) 235-1988. Email: info@acao-ottawa.org

organizations.name: Black Business and Professional Association
organizations.description: Professional development and networking organization for Black professionals and entrepreneurs. Address: 1 Dundas St W, Suite 2500, Toronto, ON M5G 1Z3. Phone: (416) 504-4097. Email: info@bbpa.org

organizations.name: Ghanaian Canadian Association of Ontario
organizations.description: Cultural organization promoting Ghanaian heritage and providing support to Ghanaian-Canadians in Ontario. Address: 25 Peel Centre Dr, Brampton, ON L6T 3R5. Phone: (905) 791-7639. Email: info@gcao.ca

organizations.name: Ghana Union Toronto
organizations.description: Community organization supporting Ghanaian immigrants with cultural events, networking, and community support. Address: 1315 Lawrence Ave W, Toronto, ON M6L 1A3. Phone: (416) 242-8744. Email: info@ghanatunion.org
